text: you need to consider that the bigger the bet you get on the more likely you are to be wrong, so having fewer bigger bets you need to be more sure of your self. more smaller bets allows you to spread that risk out a bit more. of course, what you really want is to be liquidity constrained where you're taking 100% of available liquidity whenever it looks attractive and you never hit your limits.

elements.text: you need to consider that the bigger the bet you get on the more likely you are to be wrong, so having fewer bigger bets you need to be more sure of your self. more smaller bets allows you to spread that risk out a bit more. of course, what you really want is to be liquidity constrained where you're taking 100% of available liquidity whenever it looks attractive and you never hit your limits.
